column1: Carthage Army Ability - Determination - You may spend a Command Action and mark a Determination Box on one of your units. Units with a marked box get Courage +1. If a unit with a marked box fails to deal damage with an attack, you may erase the mark to have that attack deal one damage Foresight - When you build your army you may spend army points to buy Foresight at a cost of 10 army points per point of Foresight. Before regular deployment your opponent must deploy one unit for each point of Foresight.
